thread.title: New Sanctum Inle Resort appoints general manager
thread.title_full: New Sanctum Inle Resort appoints general manager

author: Inle Lake, July 1, 2015
title: New Sanctum Inle Resort appoints general manager
text:
New Sanctum Inle Resort appoints general manager Inle Lake, July 1, 2015 
PHILIPPE Arnaud has been named general manager of the new Sanctum Inle Resort in Myanmarâ€™s Inle Lake region. 

Arnaud comes to the resort, which is managed by the Apple Tree Group, with more than 30 years of hospitality experience. 

Prior to this role, the Frenchman served a three-year stint as corporate operations manager for Valotel France.
